attributes.action: A life for a life! Bring back the death penalty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets take control of our country and bring back the death penalty and allow people to feel safe! Murderers are today getting soft sentences whilst families of murdered victims serve a life sentence, children have no father and quality of life is non exsistant, whilst they sit in a cell for a few years with a colour TV and 3 hot meals a day, all free of charge! Thats not justice...weve had enough, lets get this goverment to listen to us, murderers lose all human rights when they take a life. Life means life!

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ref-on-death/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
